message: Hey I'd like to say hi to any pyowans before this is all over. Suggestions on when & where to meet?
I should have set this group up earlier. Few have joined yet, and those here are making last day plans already. Maybe we could do a after PyCon meetup? 3:30-ish?
I'm in the commons area outside the sprint room
I have a staff shirt on
Sorry, I thought this was a no-go (no responses), so I'm not there.
I'll be out after the lightning talks.
It sure looks that way. I was in the Green Room until the afternoon lightning talks
l leave super early Monday morning. If anyone would like to meet tonight please reply or DM me on Twitter: @bgneal
